briefdescription.para: GPS horizontal accuracy in accuracyUnits, -1 if not available.
GPS direction, bearing in degrees clockwise from north to direction of travel.
GPS position is available (position property is a valid number).
GPS position and accuracy is simulated (not real from GPS sensor).

detaileddescription.para: This is a readonly property. To change to simulated position, see QgsQuickPositionKit::simulatePositionLongLatRad

briefdescription.para: Associated map settings.

detaileddescription.para: Should be initialized before the first use from mapcanvas map settings.

briefdescription.para: GPS position in WGS84 coords.
GPS position in map coords.
Screen horizontal accuracy, 2 if not available or resolution is too small.
GPS position in device coords (pixels).
Uses of GPS and simulated position and sets its parameters.

detaileddescription.para: Vector containing longitude, latitude and radius (meters) of simulated position e.g. [-97.36, 36.93, 2] If empty vector is assigned, GPS source will be used.
From QML context, also functions useSimulatedLocation() or useGpsLocation() could be used instead

briefdescription.para: Internal source of GPS location data.

detaileddescription.para: Allows start/stop of its services or access properties.

briefdescription.para: Creates new position kit.
GPS horizontal accuracy in accuracyUnits, -1 if not available.
GPS horizontal accuracy units - meters (constant)
GPS direction, bearing in degrees clockwise from north to direction of travel.
GPS position in WGS84 coords.
GPS position and accuracy is simulated (not real from GPS sensor).

detaileddescription.para: This is a readonly property. To change to simulated position, see QgsQuickPositionKit::simulatePositionLongLatRad

briefdescription.para: Associated map settings.

detaileddescription.para: Should be initialized before the first use from mapcanvas map settings.

briefdescription.para: GPS position in WGS84 coords.
Coordinate reference system of position - WGS84 (constant)
GPS position in map coords.
Screen horizontal accuracy, 2 if not available or resolution is too small.
GPS position in device coords (pixels).
Associated map settings.

detaileddescription.para: Should be initialized before the first use from mapcanvas map settings.

briefdescription.para: Uses of GPS and simulated position and sets its parameters.

detaileddescription.para: Vector containing longitude, latitude and radius (meters) of simulated position e.g. [-97.36, 36.93, 2] If empty vector is assigned, GPS source will be used.
From QML context, also functions useSimulatedLocation() or useGpsLocation() could be used instead

briefdescription.para: Uses of GPS and simulated position and sets its parameters.

detaileddescription.para: Vector containing longitude, latitude and radius (meters) of simulated position e.g. [-97.36, 36.93, 2] If empty vector is assigned, GPS source will be used.
From QML context, also functions useSimulatedLocation() or useGpsLocation() could be used instead

briefdescription.para: Returns pointer to the internal QGeoPositionInfoSource object used to receive GPS location.

simplesect.para: The returned pointer is only valid until sourceChanged() signal is emitted

briefdescription.para: Use real GPS source (not simulated)
Use simulated GPS source.

detaileddescription.para: Simulated GPS source emulates point on circle around defined point in specified radius
We do not want to have the origin point as property We basically want to set it once based on project/map cente and keep it that way regardless of mapsettings change (e.g. zoom etc)

parameterdescription.para: longitude of the centre of the emulated points
latitude of the centre of the emulated points
distance of emulated points from the centre (in degrees WSG84)

briefdescription.para: GPS horizontal accuracy in accuracyUnits, -1 if not available.
GPS horizontal accuracy units - meters (constant)
GPS direction, bearing in degrees clockwise from north to direction of travel.
hasPosition changed
GPS position and accuracy is simulated (not real from GPS sensor).

detaileddescription.para: This is a readonly property. To change to simulated position, see QgsQuickPositionKit::simulatePositionLongLatRad

briefdescription.para: Associated map settings.

detaileddescription.para: Should be initialized before the first use from mapcanvas map settings.

briefdescription.para: Emitted when the internal source of GPS location data has been replaced.
Convenient set of tools to read GPS position and accuracy.

detaileddescription.para: Also, if one can use use_simulated_location to specify simulated position. Simulated position source generates random points in circles around the selected point and radius. Real GPS position is not used in this mode.
